law.catch_line: Costs to be reimbursed; method of collecting.

text.section:
Sec. 11B-14. Costs to be reimbursed; method of collecting.
In the event that the Dade County Fire Department is requested by the permittee to extinguish a fire on a dump or land fill site, or in the event that a permit is revoked under the provisions of(b) of this chapter and the Dade County Fire Department extinguishers the fire on the dump or land fill site, the County Manager shall cause to be prepared a statement of all costs incurred by Dade County incident to extinguishing the fire.
Upon preparation of the statement, the County Manager shall certify the statement as being correct and shall present said statement to the permittee and request payment thereof. The permittee shall make payment in full within twenty (20) days of receiving said statement.
